name: dfwsc-monorepo
description: DFW Software Consulting - Full-stack payment portal with React frontend and Fastify backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd front && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm run build:server
scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix front && npm install --prefix backend

author: DFW Software Consulting
